scenarios: a great victory or achievement.

usages: fresh pineapple is useful in savoury as well as in sweet dishes

weakness in countable manner

weired behaviour which most people like
usages: Quirky to me are a tad eccentric. They have traits that most people like

usages: she had an image of being tough and decisive

a mass departure of people

scenarios: a short flash of light/ shine
usages: her glasses glinted in the firelight

scenarios: a connection or series of connections linking two or more things.
अन्तर्सम्बन्ध
usages: connection is (uncountable) the act of connecting while nexus is a form of connection.
The nexus between industry and government can both be good and bad for the nation

scenarios: illegal and morally wrong
usages: Illicit can be something that is illegal, but it can also be something that is morally wrong or against societal norms
the illicit trade in stolen vehicles
an illicit love affair

scenarios: विशाल, extremely large or great, especially in scale or degree.
usages: the cost of restoration has been immense

scenarios: growing, फूलना, बहार पर आना
usages: we use flower to mean a fully mature blossom, and blossom to mean the first sign of a flower emerging from a bud. So when something is blossoming, it is growing.
I'm not going to bloomin' well apologize to him!
Jo looked really well, positively blooming.
